title: Sharks
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 843 words, Level Q (Grade 3), Lexile 790L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and M		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and M
description: Sharks describes the physical appearances, eating habits, and attack capabilities of sharks. Although sharks are thought of as dangerous killers, only a small percentage actually are. Book and lesson also available at Levels J and M.
highFrequencyWords: camouflage, cartilage, dorsal fin, extinction, plankton
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Compound Words                : Identify and form compound words
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
